title: Cohort-2 Starter Course Task 4 - Read Front end web

questions.text: Has your experience of taking these surveys gotten better?  If so, how is it better?
Have you explored any of the web mentoring sites listed on this page?  If so, which ones and what did you learn?
Have you taken any of the challenges in those sites? If so which one?
Were you able to create your own web page on your local computer? What did you learn?
Did you already know any of the HTML5 new features? Did you learn any more in this lesson?
What is the difference between the purpose of HTML and CSS?
Do you know anything about the JavaScript language? What have you written using it?
What is the difference between a URL starting with 'file:' and 'http:'?
What more do you want to learn about front end development?
Did you read Philemon's roadmap to a career in frong end development?
How much time has Task 4 taken to complete?
